specifications.Dye Method: Piece Dye - Yarn Effect > High Twist Yarn High twist yarn is made by tightly twisting staple fibers or filament yarns, resulting in a higher number of twists per unit length. It adds texture, a crisp feeling, and a cool touch to the fabric.
specifications.Care Advice: Woven > Plain > Crepe This fabric can easily build up static electricity, especially in dry conditions. To prevent this, make sure the air has enough moisture. Regenerated > Modal This fabric can shrink or become distorted if it get wet. Store it in a cool, dry, well-ventilated location.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring Do not bleach Line dry Iron on low heat on reverse side if needed Recommended Use Blouses
